link_desc:
Template containing items available for the device.

Includes RAID monitoring, drives, interfaces, Fan, Voltage, etc.

MIB USED:

- IOMEGANAS-MIB

- HOST-RESOURCES-MIB

- SNMPV2MIB

Template items configured for use with SNMPv3 (authNoPriv), because only this version is supported by the device.

Probably compatible with other models of the same line (but not tested), such as:

px2-300d

px4-300d

px4-300r

px6-300d

px12-400r

px12-450r

------------------------------------------------

1. Configure SNMP in your LenovoEMC device;

2. Import the Template;

3. Associate the template to your host;

4. Define macros {$SNMP_SECNAME} and {$SNMP_AUTH}.
tags: lenovoemc, lenovo, emc, nas, storage, snmp, iomega
author: Jhonatan Morais
